_a-0000e99c-1217-8000-9ba9-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_UTIL_FormatDateTime

_a-0000e98b-cfe0-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_UTIL_QueryRecord

_a-0000e99c-1217-8000-9ba9-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_UTIL_HeaderField

_a-0000ee7c-aeb9-8000-9da3-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_KB_Resource_Summary_Wrapper

_a-0000eb2c-b6af-8000-9c5d-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_UTIL_ReplaceArgs

_a-0000e9f4-1323-8000-9bd3-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_UTIL_LoadBrandingMap

_a-0000e9ca-3659-8000-9bb8-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_UTIL_GetSiteUrl
_a-0000e9ca-3659-8000-9bb8-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!authedPath: cast(
    'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Text',
    extract(linktodocument(0, "doc"), """", "/doc/")
  ),
  local!subdomainWithDomain: extract(local!authedPath, "//", "/suite")[1],
  local!subdomain: split(local!subdomainWithDomain, ".")[1],
  a!map(
    subdomain: local!subdomain,
    authedPath: local!authedPath,
    subdomainWithDomain: local!subdomainWithDomain
  )
)

_a-0000ee7c-aeb9-8000-9da3-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_KB_Resource_Summary_Document

_a-0000ee67-6b40-8000-9d9d-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_KB_QR_GetResources
_a-0000ee67-6b40-8000-9d9d-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!CMGT_UTIL_QueryRecord(
  recordType: recordType!CMGT_KB_Resource,
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  executeWhen: ri!executeWhen,
  filters: {
    ri!additionalFilters,
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!CMGT_KB_Resource.caseTypeUuid,
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!caseTypeUuid
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!CMGT_KB_Resource.resourceId,
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!resourceIds
    )
  },
  logicalExpressions: ri!additionalLogicalExpression,
  fields: {
    ri!fields,
    recordType!CMGT_KB_Resource.document,
    recordType!CMGT_KB_Resource.resourceText,
    recordType!CMGT_KB_Resource.resourceType,
    recordType!CMGT_KB_Resource.createdByUser,
    recordType!CMGT_KB_Resource.modifiedByUser
  },
  relatedRecordData: { ri!relatedRecordData },
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  sort: ri!sort,
  groupByFields: ri!groupByFields,
  searchTerm: ri!searchTerm,
  searchFields: ri!searchFields
)

_a-0000e9fa-aa45-8000-9bda-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_UTIL_DisplayUser

_a-0000ee7c-aeb9-8000-9da3-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_KB_Resource_Configuration
